overview: The foundation of the City of Colima could not be understood without the presence of the Colima River which, along with other remnants, is born on the slopes of the Volcano and runs its way to the coast into a huge riverbed called Río Armería.

production_companies.name: Que Brote la Semilla A. C.
Secretaría de Cultura del Estado de Colima

title: Laugh Me A River, Colima
